article.headline: UAB 84, Tulsa 70
article.story: BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) -- Robert Vaden hit eight 3-pointers and finished with 26 points to help UAB come from behind to defeat Tulsa 84-70 Wednesday night. The win clinched second place in Conference USA for the Blazers and the second seed in the upcoming league tournament in Memphis, Tenn. Lawrence Kinnard scored 15 points and Channing Toney added 13 for UAB. Aaron Johnson had 12 points and seven assists for the Blazers. Ray Reese scored 19 points for Tulsa and 7-foot center Jerome Jordan had 16 points, 14 rebounds and five blocked shots. Ben Uzoh added 15 points for the Golden Hurricane. UAB (22-8, 12-3) won for the seventh time in eight games. Tulsa (16-12, 7-8 CUSA) lost for only the second time in eight games. Tulsa led 39-36 at halftime, and the game stayed tight deep into the second half. UAB led 61-60 with 8:29 left in the game, and that's when Vaden took over. He hit four 3-pointers over the next four minutes, some from well beyond the arc. Vaden's final three gave UAB 77-65 lead with 4:25 left. Tulsa could get no closer than 10 points the rest of the way. Vaden is averaging 27 points over his last five games and has made 31 3-pointers during that stretch. UAB has compiled a 13-1 record at home this season.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
